languages.text: "Целый культ отродий скрывался среди почтеннейших покойных династии... Немыслимо!"
"An entire cult of mutant spawn, hiding among the dynasty's most eminent dead... It's simply inconceivable!"
languages.original_text: "Целый культ отродий скрывался среди почтеннейших покойных династии... Немыслимо!"

languages.text: "Ein ganzer Kult von mutiertem Abschaum, der sich unter den angesehensten Toten der Dynastie versteckt ... Das ist einfach unfassbar!"
languages.original_text: "An entire cult of mutant spawn, hiding among the dynasty's most eminent dead... It's simply inconceivable!"

traits.locale_text: "Ein ganzer Kult von mutiertem Abschaum, der sich unter den angesehensten Toten der Dynastie versteckt ... Das ist einfach unfassbar!"

languages.text: « Une secte entière de mutants, cachée parmi les plus éminents disparus de la dynastie... C'est tout bonnement inconcevable ! »
languages.original_text: "An entire cult of mutant spawn, hiding among the dynasty's most eminent dead... It's simply inconceivable!"

traits.locale_text: « Une secte entière de mutants, cachée parmi les plus éminents disparus de la dynastie... C'est tout bonnement inconcevable ! »

languages.text: «Un culto entero de engendros mutantes escondidos entre los más insignes muertos de la dinastía... ¡Es inconcebible!».
languages.original_text: "An entire cult of mutant spawn, hiding among the dynasty's most eminent dead... It's simply inconceivable!"

traits.locale_text: «Un culto entero de engendros mutantes escondidos entre los más insignes muertos de la dinastía... ¡Es inconcebible!».

languages.text: 「王朝の最も著名な死者の中に隠れている変異体の教団すべてが出てきただと…そんな馬鹿な！」
languages.original_text: "An entire cult of mutant spawn, hiding among the dynasty's most eminent dead... It's simply inconceivable!"

traits.locale_text: 「王朝の最も著名な死者の中に隠れている変異体の教団すべてが出てきただと…そんな馬鹿な！」

languages.text: “变种人的邪教教派，居然藏身于王朝最显赫的死者之中……这简直是匪夷所思！”
languages.original_text: "An entire cult of mutant spawn, hiding among the dynasty's most eminent dead... It's simply inconceivable!"

traits.locale_text: “变种人的邪教教派，居然藏身于王朝最显赫的死者之中……这简直是匪夷所思！”

languages.original_text: "An entire cult of mutant spawn, hiding among the dynasty's most eminent dead... It is simply inconceivable!"

languages.text: "Mutant yaratıklarından oluşan koca bir tarikat, hanedanlığın en seçkin ölüleri arasında saklanıyor... Akıl alacak gibi değil!"
languages.original_text: "An entire cult of mutant spawn, hiding among the dynasty's most eminent dead... It's simply inconceivable!"
